pages.text: The idea of fermenting $(l:magical_blocks/titration_barrel#kimchi)food$(/l) and $(l:magical_items/infused_beverages)drinks$(/l) in $(l:general/colored_trees#colored_wood)Colored Wood$(/l) was not far away. Over time, the properties of the wood influences contents.$(br2)The results are sometimes more, sometimes less delicious, but always interesting. (On the other hand, the last could of course also be due to your cooking skills)$(br)Holds up to a stack of items and 1 bucket of liquid.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: $(italic)When you blink and it felt like the world stopped existing? Each time that happens, the barrel fermentation process seems to have advanced.

pages.title: The Art of Brewing
pages.text: Fermentation is a very natural thing. But sadly, like most natural things, things take time and care. And since it's not a fully controlled environment there are a lot of variables to it.$(br)$(li)Time: Time, of course, being the most important ingredient. While some beverages only seeming to get more intense after more time, others go bad eventually

$(li)Temperature: The hotter it is, the more of your precious content simply evaporates over time, called the Angel's Share$(br)$(li)Humidity: The more humid the air, the more water evaporates in comparison to alcohol, making the drink stronger

$(li)Water share: The ratio of ingredients to water is a fine balance, but one to be played with. A higher share of ingredients make the drinks stronger (more powerful effects), while more fluid gives more yield, of course, as well as allowing the magical wood to better evolve, making effects last longer. $(br2)4 items feels like a good starting point.

pages.title: Kimchi
pages.text: Fermentation is not only for drinks! Made from 3 different vegetables, Kimchi is a hearty dish, best served as a side.

pages.title: Clotted Cream
pages.text: Slightly fermented, it still keeps the properties of $(thing)Milk$(). Eating will remove currently active Status Effects.

pages.title: Fresh Chocolate
pages.text: A great snack, literally: biting off a piece is quick and even makes you reasonably full.$(br)Pleasantly sweet and fruity.

pages.title: Hot Chocolate
pages.text: Perfect to come to the calm and in the cold season.

pages.title: Pure Alcohol
pages.text: Your memory isn't always up to snuff. Somehow you ended up with this stuff. Got a little stronger than planned.$(br)More to disinfect than to drink....
